features.title: Why Choose PastorAgenda?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your ministry
features.description: PastorAgenda provides a comprehensive solution for religious leaders to manage appointments, share their availability, and connect with their community.

feature1.title: Easy Scheduling
feature1.description: Create custom event types with specific durations and availability rules. Let people book appointments that fit your schedule.

feature2.title: Flexible Options
feature2.description: Share your unique profile URL with your community. People can easily find and book appointments with you.

feature3.title: Smart Availability
feature3.description: Set your weekly availability and let our system automatically find the best time slots for appointments.

feature4.title: Secure & Private
feature4.description: Built with security in mind. Your data is protected and appointments are managed with privacy and care.
